title: Blended Learning Environment Construction for Social Studies Using IMS Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Core concepts of secondary social studies and basic proficiency in digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Designing Social Studies Learning Environments Combining Smartphone-Based Digital Environments and Face-to-Face Instruction

learning_goals: Learners can structure blended learning environments according to IMS Learning Design (LD) principles

Learners design at least two learning activities for each of three social studies topics (e.g., civic engagement, cultural diversity, sustainability) using IMS LD components (activities, environment, methods) in a smartphone environment and submit a design plan meeting at least four of five peer evaluation rubric criteria.
Learners can analyze formative assessment results to propose adjustments to the learning design (LD).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
